revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 57:;Aphrodisios, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetesouchos, drachmas 4;;Petsiris, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tapontos, drachmas 12;;Harpalos, his son, mother Tepheros , drachmas 12;;in total for the day drachmas 60 obols 15;;(Pharmouthi) 22 likewise:;Gaius Julius Petronianus (Apolinarios, son of Sarapas):;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 14) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 11obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 3.5, naubion drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 7 obols 3, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, kollybos obls 2.5, in total drachmas 25 obols 2; ;Didyme, daughter of Pakysis (sister of Menas):;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 16) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5 chalki 2, naubion obl 1.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obols 4, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 7 obol 0.5;;Heraklas, son of Leonides, grandson of Kastor, mother Thaisas, drachmas 12;;Horion, son of Lupus, grandson of Horos, mother Ammonarion, drachmas 12;;Herieus, son of Sambas, grandson of Peteesis, mother Tapapeis, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Peteesis, grandson of Apollonios, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 4;;Gaius Julius Apolinarios (daughter of Theon, katandrographos);;(in left margin: drachmas 16) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5, naubion obol 2, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 5.5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obols 3.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 7 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 7 obols 3;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year obols 4, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 4.5 chalki 2;;Dioskoros, son of Aiaus, grandson of Orsenouohis, mother Thases, drachmas 8;;Thermouthis, daughter of Petheus (Protas, son of Paskouis);;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 23) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1 chalki 2, naubion obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2;;eparourion obols 5, surcharges obol 0.5, in total drachma 2 obols 5.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 obols 2;;Horos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Ptollas, son of Satabous, grandson of Ptollas, mother Tapontos, drachmas 4 obols 28;;Papontos, son of Apynchis (Hatres, porter);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 8) apomoira drachma 1 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5 , in total drachmas 3 obols 5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 4 obols 2.5 chalki 2;;in total for the day drachmas 124 obols 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
